gw.document

Class DocumentCreationInfo.DynamicWidgetInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.document.DocumentCreationInfo.DynamicWidgetInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentCreationInfo.DynamicWidgetInfo
    Enclosing class:
    DocumentCreationInfo

    public static class DocumentCreationInfo.DynamicWidgetInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper object which corresponds to a context object whose value must be chosen by the user when creating a document from a document template. This wrapper is required to allow a simple mapping from the context object to the UI widget displayed to the user.

    See IDocumentTemplateDescriptor for more information on context objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamicWidgetInfo(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String displayName, java.lang.String defaultValueExpression, java.lang.String possibleValuesExpression, boolean showNoneSelected)
      Create a new DynamicWidgetInfo object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDefaultValueExpression()
      Returns a Gosu expression which should be evaluated to determine the default value of the context object.
      java.lang.String getDisplayName()
      Returns the name to be displayed to the user for the context object.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the internal unique name of the corresponding context object.
      java.lang.String getPossibleValuesExpression()
      Returns a Gosu expression which should be evaluated to determine the set of possible values for the context object.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Returns the type of the context object, used to determine the type of UI widget used to display the values.
      boolean isShowNoneSelected()
      Returns true if "none selected" is a valid choice for this context object (i.e. the context object value can be null), false otherwise.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DynamicWidgetInfo

        public DynamicWidgetInfo(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String displayName,
                         java.lang.String defaultValueExpression,
                         java.lang.String possibleValuesExpression,
                         boolean showNoneSelected)
        Create a new DynamicWidgetInfo object
        Parameters:
        name - The internal unique name of the corresponding context object.
        type - The type of the context object, used to determine the type of UI widget used to display the values.
        displayName - The name to be displayed to the user for the context object.
        defaultValueExpression - A Gosu expression which should be evaluated to determine the default value of the context object.
        possibleValuesExpression - A Gosu expression which should be evaluated to determine the set of possible values for the context object.
        showNoneSelected - Whether "none selected" is a valid choice for this context object.
